note: Mariah Adams is an emerging fine art photographer. She is a champion as a person with multiple disabilities, as a trauma survivor, as a mother, and as a full-time student. She is currently pursuing an AA degree in Photography at AAU in San Francisco. Among her disabilities are several mental health conditions that give her a unique perspective on the world around her. She uses her love of photography to express herself and show the rest of the world how she sees things.
